flawed_nl_solution:
Marge had 23 - 5 = <<23-5=18>>18 seeds grow into plants.
Rabbits ate 18 / 3 = <<18/3=6>>6 plants.
There were 18 - 6 = <<18-6=15>>15 plants left.
Weeds strangled 15 / 3 = <<15/3=5>>5 plants.
She had 15 - 5 = <<15-5=10>>10 plants left.
Marge kept 1 weed, so she ended up with 10 + 1 = <<10+1=11>>11 plants.
#### 11

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 12, not 15. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
